title: GET_ENTITY_HEALTH
content:
0xEEF059FAD016D2090x8E3222B7// GetEntityHealth
int GET_ENTITY_HEALTH(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to get the health from.Returns: The current entity health.Returns an integer value of entity's current health.
Example of range for ped:
- Player [0 to 200]
- Ped [100 to 200]
- Vehicle [0 to 1000]
- Object [0 to 1000]
Health is actually a float value but this native casts it to int.
In order to get the actual value, do:
float health = *(float *)(entityAddress + 0x280);
Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local health = GetEntityHealth(PlayerPedId())
print(health)
codeBlocks:
